text: (viśvāsavantayini! mema pratikṣēpa karannangē) napurukam sampūrṇayenma paha vī allāhgē dharmaya sampūrṇayenma sthāvara vana turu (makkāvāsīn vana pratikṣēpa karana) ovun samaga yuddha karanu. (napurukam kirīmen) ovun ǣt vuvahot niyata vaśayenma allāh ovun karana dæya avadhānayen yutuva balanneku vaśayenma siṭinnēya
